Proto bowed,"Very humbly I might add sire, Please bring me to the map room so I may show you with visual aid what I plan to do."

  Destructor looked at the preds around him and up at Hydras. His mind thought of how much ahs changed since he died, and home much he loathed Megatron making Galvatron power weaker by fusing with him. Thats what he thought anyway. "I will defeat our enemy, i think i have an idea on how Proto plans tod o it, but ill let him speak."
